title: An Act relative to a technical change to the George L. Darey Inland Fisheries and Game Fund

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Vieira of Falmouth, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1064) of David T. Vieira relative to changing the name of the Inland Fisheries and Game Fund to the George L. Darey inland fisheries and game fund.  Environment and Natural Resources.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Environment and Natural Resources

related_entities.name: committee on Environment and Natural Resources

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 07/01/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-1
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling

related_entities.name: committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling
the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling

actions.description: Committee reported that the matter be placed in the Orders of the Day for the next sitting
Read second and ordered to a third reading
